outputs.output_descr:
The project will rapidly generate demand for youth labor using local resource and labor intensive approaches to contribute to a modern infrastructure and utilities for rural and urban populations. The scope of the project is focused on training of local labor resources to capacitate them to undertake roads work and waste management activities. Hence, the project will support two types of labor intensive works: road works and waste management.
The project expected outputs are:
1. Labor based Coordination Unit established within MOHRDL, functional and operational 
2. Capacities for unskilled young workers are developed through labor based and business development methods

project_descr: The overall objective of this project is to create rapid employment opportunities for unemployed unskilled and semi-skilled workers through labor intensive infrastructure development.
